long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aidify is a free typing analytics tool that allows teachers to evaluate students on their writing process, not just on their final document.
Teachers can generate a report on any Google Doc that they have edit access to. The report helps to evaluate student work habits, writing process, collaboration and effort.

There is no login, set-up or account creation required. Simply download the extension for free and start using it!

Features:
Improve student work habits
- Check student progress and time management
- See the time and duration that students worked on the document

Group work stats
- View individual contributions on group documents
- Easily see the effort each student put on the document

Simple and user friendly
- Generates a graphical report with summary and statistics
- Provides a video playback showing all student edits with timestamps
- No installation on student computer required
- No set-up, account creation or login required

Combat AI plagiarism
- Track revision count and history
- Identify "copy-paste" writing
- Verify student effort put into document
- Stop false accusations of AI plagiarism
